General.Name: Lifespot Capital AG
General.Description: MHP Hotel AG operates as an independent hotel investment and management company. It designs and implements hotel, gastronomy, and bar concepts; and operates as a partnership link between hotel investors and franchisors, as well as between its hotel guests and hotel teams on site. The company was formerly known as Lifespot Capital AG. MHP Hotel AG was founded in 2012 and is based in Munich, Germany.
